thread.title: HALLOWEEN 2015: Dia de los Muertos SweeTARTS
thread.title_full: HALLOWEEN 2015: Dia de los Muertos SweeTARTS - Press Enterprise

author: FIELDING BUCK
title: HALLOWEEN 2015: Dia de los Muertos SweeTARTS
text:
BY FIELDING BUCK / STAFF WRITER
 Updated: 3:15 p.m. HALLOWEEN 2015: Dia de los Muertos SweeTARTS Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Related article » Special “Skull & Bones” SweetTARTS will be available this fall to celebrate Dia de los Muertos, Nestlé USA announced Wednesday.
A 12-ounce bag of the trick-or-treat favorites will have a suggested price of $2.99, according to a news release.
Nestlé has a tie-in with the upcoming “Peanuts Movie,” to be released Nov. 6.
It will sell Crunch bars molded with shapes of eight Peanuts characters. The MSRP is $3.49 for 11 ounces or $5.99 for 21 ounces.
Nestlé will also sell breakable 1.2 ounce Peanuts medallions for 99 cents.
